channel.description: Story and Art by Amy Tucker

item.title: Heels ‘Cause Why Not?! (3)
item.dc:creator: amyt
item.description: This is probably the final sketch of the “Heels ’cause why not” series but I might start doing more things like this in the future. Every time I look at this one it makes me laugh, look at Pootys stupid smile, look at his tiny, little, tiny feet! LOOK AT THEM!!!   Amy
item.content:encoded:
This is probably the final sketch of the “Heels ’cause why not” series but I might start doing more things like this in the future.

Every time I look at this one it makes me laugh, look at Pootys stupid smile, look at his tiny, little, tiny feet! LOOK AT THEM!!!

 

Amy

item.title: Heels ‘Cause Why Not?! (2)
item.dc:creator: amyt
item.description: Here we have another sketch for the “Heels ’cause why not” series. This time it’s Professor Locos turn, he really isn’t the type to wear high heels so when I was designing these I was just thinking, if Loco had to wear high heels what would they look like? And this is what I came … Continue reading Heels ‘Cause Why Not?! (2) →
item.content:encoded:
Here we have another sketch for the “Heels ’cause why not” series. This time it’s Professor Locos turn, he really isn’t the type to wear high heels so when I was designing these I was just thinking, if Loco had to wear high heels what would they look like? And this is what I came up with!

See ya in the next blog post (hopefully)

 

Amy

item.title: Heels Cause Why Not?! (1)

But I’m back now and I have a few sketches to post and this is the first one. All of the sketches are part of a series I’m  calling “Heels ’cause why … Continue reading Heels Cause Why Not?! (1) →
item.content:encoded:
Hiya, don’t worry, I’m still alive! I just haven’t updated the blog because…Eh… Because…Emmm… Ok, I have no excuse, I’ve just been lazy. But I’m back now and I have a few sketches to post and this is the first one.

All of the sketches are part of a series I’m  calling “Heels ’cause why not?!”  in this series I’m going to be drawing characters from my comic Mystery Club wearing, you guessed it, heels!

Oh, and just in case any shoe companies are reading this, don’t feel shy about asking me to do a collaboration, maybe I could design some Mystery Club themed shoes and you make them! Heh! Heh! Just kidding! * mutter * but if you want to…

See ya soon (hopefully)

 

Amy
